name: Techno Orc
description:
Techno Orc is an FPS game that has multiple tasks located in a tribal Horde island. The main character is an Orc named Garnvard who is trained to use a high-technological weapons. These consist a star pistol, Plasma Shooter and a space forces laser. These weapons surely are built from the goblins nearby but the Orc is the only one who can carry out these weapons to fight the invaders. Pigvaders want to destroy the whole island and steal the horde loots but the Garnvard is one mad lad. He will do whatever it takes to drive off all the Pigvader forces away from the Horde island. The Goblins on the other hand are neutral, killing them or helping them is all up to you, but saving a goblin is only an honor to the Horde when it comes to fighting Pigvaders.

The goblins will be located in multiple tents, and every tent will provide a lot of assist to Garnvard. The main quest is to kill the Pigs Boss, but Garnvard needs to find Keys to open the Gate and also has to look out for the strongest weapon located in the map to drive away all the Pigvaders and their leader once and for all.

~~~

Note: The way to use the health potions that are stored in your inventory needs this these steps.

1. Pick up the early game empty bottle located in front of the player at the start of the game.

2. Once you pick up the empty bottle, you can click on 4 to hold it the whole game with left hand.

3. Everytime you pick up the pink potions, you will store them as inventory drinks to put on your empty bottle.

4. Click on H to restore 100 of your health ( You can't use the potion if you are above 500 health and because of that you will not worry about mis-clicking or accidentally using all 5).

~~~

Garnvard Health: 600
